channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: My husband and I are splitting our estate between his child and my three children. Should they get equal shares?
item.description: “We try to help all our kids when we can, yet push for self-sufficiency.”

item.title: ‘I’m not looking to leave any money to the kids’: We’re in our 60s with $1.5 million in IRAs. Can we retire next year?
I’m only 54 and my 401(k) plan is emailing me about buying annuities. Is this something I should do?
item.description: Options will keep coming, but signing up for an annuity is something you want to carefully consider

item.title: You’ve just won the $1.5 billion Powerball jackpot. Here are the 5 money moves you need to make next.
item.description: But even if you’re not a big lottery winner in Saturday’s Powerball drawing, it’s still worth heeding this advice for managing a significant sum of mo...

item.title: ‘I don’t know how much my wife earns’: I’m 63 with $6.4 million in stocks, mostly Apple. Will I get punished on taxes?
item.description: “Each of our properties are worth over $1 million.”

item.title: Arabica Coffee Prices Hit Record on U.S., Colombia Tariff Spat
item.description: Arabica coffee prices hit a record level, as traders digested the withdrawal of President Trump’s threats to impose tariffs and economic sanctions on ...

item.title: Financial Services Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: Gain insight on Experian, SoFi Technologies and more in the latest Market Talks covering Financial Services.

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.

item.title: DeepSeek Won't Sink U.S. AI Titans
item.description: Panic fueling the selloff of Nvidia, Broadcom and other tech giants is overblown.

item.title: Stocks Sink in Broad AI Rout Sparked by China's DeepSeek
